pullRequest.body:
In the file ‘FiniteDimensionalConvexFunctionsLocallyLipschitz.lean’ , We prove that each convex function on an open convex subset of FiniteDimensional space is Lipschitz continuous, so that continuous.

The file 'l1Sapce.lean' proves some conclusions related to l_1 space that are used in the file 'FiniteDimensionalConvexFunctionsLocallyLipschitz.lean'.

pullRequest.title: feat: finite-dimensional convex functions  are locally Lipschitz
